channel.title: Vim on 自在生活
channel.description: Recent content in Vim on 自在生活

item.title: 自用vim常用配置
item.description: 常用工具 ctrlsf.vim 快速全局搜索关键字 t - 在新tab打开选中文件 p - 预览 P - Like Enter but open file in a preview window and switch focus to it. O - Like Enter but always leave CtrlSF window opening. T - Like t but focus CtrlSF window instead of new opened tab. M - Switch result window between normal view and compact view. q - 关闭搜索窗口 - Move cursor to next match.下一个选中
